events.name: Martin Thompson - Design for performance
events.description: This event is organised in partnership with the amazing Yow! conference. Martin Thompson is a UK-based consultant, coach and Java Champion with over 2 decades of experience building complex and high-performance computing systems. He specialises in designing high-performance and low-latency systems. In the performance space, he has changed expectations about what is possible with Java by showing that Java can compete with and even outperform native applications. In this talk Martin will explore the subject of software performance by focusing on what it means to achieve sufficient response times, throughput, and scalability.  ==== Workshop  YOW! DepthFirst Workshop - Singapore - 13 December Apart from our meetup event, Martin will be in Singapore to teach a 1-day workshop called Lock Free & High-Performance Concurrent Algorithms. You can find all the details about Martin's workshop here.
events.location: PayPal office in Suntec, 5 Temasek Blvd, #09-01 Suntec Tower Five, 038985 Nearest Mrt:Promenade(Yellow Line), Singapore

events.name: Docker december
events.description: Gerald Goh from Microsoft will present us:- Docker Machine with the Azure Docker Extension- Introduction to Azure Container Service- Running Kubernetes on Azure Container Service Food will be provided by Microsoft.
